Debug Player
  • User Guide
  • Troubleshooting
  • View page source

Troubleshooting

This section provides solutions to common issues you might encounter while using Debug Player.

Installation Issues

  1. Installation Fails with Permission Errors

    Symptom: - Error messages about insufficient permissions during installation

    Solution: - Use a virtual environment (recommended):

    python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate  # On Windows: venv\Scripts\activate
pip install debug-player

    • Or use the –user flag: .. code-block:: bash

      pip install –user debug-player

  2. Missing Dependencies

    Symptom: - Import errors about missing modules

    Solution: - Install required dependencies:

    pip install -r requirements.txt

  3. Incompatible Python Version

    Symptom: - Errors about Python version during installation

    Solution: - Debug Player requires Python 3.8 or later - Check your Python version:

    python --version

    • If needed, install a compatible Python version

  4. Installation Hangs

    Symptom: - Installation appears to freeze or take too long

    Solution: - Increase the timeout:

    pip --default-timeout=1000 install debug-player

    • Or use a different package index: .. code-block:: bash

      pip install -i https://pypi.org/simple debug-player

Application Startup Issues

  1. Application Crashes on Startup

    Symptom: - Application closes immediately after opening - No error message is displayed

    Solution: - Try running from the command line to see error messages:

    debug-player --log-level=debug

    • Reset the configuration: .. code-block:: bash

      debug-player –reset-settings

  2. Blank Window on Startup

    Symptom: - Application window appears but is blank

    Solution: - Update your graphics drivers - Try software rendering:

    debug-player --disable-gpu

    • Reset window layout: .. code-block:: bash

      rm -rf ~/.config/DebugPlayer/layouts

  3. Missing Icons or UI Elements

    Symptom: - Icons appear as placeholders or are missing - UI elements are misaligned

    Solution: - Clear the icon cache:

    rm -rf ~/.cache/DebugPlayer

    • Reinstall the application

Data Loading Issues

  1. File Not Loading

    Symptom: - Error when trying to open a file - File appears to load but no data is displayed

    Solution: - Check that the file format is supported - Try opening the file in a text editor to verify it’s not corrupted - Check file permissions - Try a different file from the same source

  2. Incorrect Data Display

    Symptom: - Data loads but appears incorrect or garbled - Wrong values or time stamps

    Solution: - Check the file encoding - Verify the delimiter (comma, tab, etc.) - Check if headers are being interpreted correctly - Try importing with different options

  3. Large Files Load Slowly

    Symptom: - Application becomes unresponsive when loading large files - High memory usage

    Solution: - Enable chunked loading in settings - Increase memory allocation - Close other applications - Consider splitting large files

Performance Issues

  1. Slow Interface

    Symptom: - GUI is slow to respond - High CPU usage

    Solution: - Reduce the number of visible signals - Increase the plot update interval - Disable anti-aliasing - Close unused plots

  2. High Memory Usage

    Symptom: - Application uses too much memory - System becomes slow

    Solution: - Close unused files and plots - Reduce the data cache size in settings - Restart the application - Increase system swap space

  3. Plot Updates Are Slow

    Symptom: - Plot updates are slow or laggy - Animation is not smooth

    Solution: - Reduce the number of points being displayed - Enable downsampling - Use simpler plot styles - Disable auto-scrolling

Plugin Issues

  1. Plugin Fails to Load

    Symptom: - Error message when loading a plugin - Plugin doesn’t appear in the list

    Solution: - Check that the plugin is compatible with your version - Verify all dependencies are installed - Check the application logs for errors

  2. Plugin Crashes

    Symptom: - Application crashes when using a plugin - Plugin stops responding

    Solution: - Update the plugin to the latest version - Report the issue to the plugin author - Disable the plugin if not needed

  3. Missing Functionality

    Symptom: - Expected features are missing - Buttons or menus don’t work

    Solution: - Check the plugin documentation - Verify the plugin is properly installed - Check for updates

Display Issues

  1. Blurry Text

    Symptom: - Text appears blurry on high-DPI displays

    Solution: - Enable high-DPI scaling in settings - Adjust the font scaling factor - Update your graphics drivers

  2. Missing or Incorrect Colors

    Symptom: - Colors appear wrong or missing - Plots are hard to read

    Solution: - Change the color theme - Adjust the color palette in settings - Check for color vision deficiency settings

  3. UI Elements Overlapping

    Symptom: - UI elements overlap or are cut off - Text doesn’t fit in buttons

    Solution: - Adjust the application scaling - Change the font size - Reset the window layout

Export and Save Issues

  1. Failed to Save File

    Symptom: - Error when trying to save a file - File is saved but empty

    Solution: - Check write permissions - Verify there’s enough disk space - Try saving to a different location

  2. Exported Data is Incorrect

    Symptom: - Exported data doesn’t match what’s displayed - Missing or incorrect values

    Solution: - Check the export settings - Try a different export format - Verify the data range being exported

  3. Large Export Files

    Symptom: - Exporting takes too long - Export files are very large

    Solution: - Reduce the data range - Use a more efficient format (e.g., HDF5 instead of CSV) - Enable compression if available

Network and Remote Access Issues

  1. Cannot Connect to Remote Server

    Symptom: - Unable to connect to a remote Debug Player instance - Connection timeouts

    Solution: - Verify the server is running and accessible - Check firewall settings - Verify the port number

  2. Slow Remote Performance

    Symptom: - Slow response when using remote features - High latency

    Solution: - Check network connection - Reduce the data transfer rate - Use a wired connection instead of Wi-Fi

  3. Authentication Failures

    Symptom: - Authentication errors when connecting - Permission denied

    Solution: - Verify username and password - Check authentication settings on the server - Update certificates if using SSL

Getting Help

If you’re still experiencing issues:

  1. Check the Logs - View application logs in “Help” > “Show Logs” - Look for error messages or warnings

  2. Search the Documentation - Check the User Guide - Look for known issues and workarounds

  3. Check for Updates - Make sure you’re using the latest version - Check for plugin updates

  4. Ask the Community - Search the GitHub issues - Ask a question on our Discord server - Email support@imagry.com

When requesting help, please provide:

  1. Debug Player version

  2. Operating system and version

  3. Steps to reproduce the issue

  4. Any error messages

  5. Relevant log output
